meanings.definition: The action of rubbing and kneading the body to promote relaxation or relieve tension.
meanings.sent1: After a long day at work, she enjoys receiving massages to relax her muscles.
meanings.sent2: I scheduled a massage appointment to help with my back pain.
meanings.sent3: The cat gave the dog playful massages with its paws.
meanings.sent4: The soothing music in the spa added to the calming effect of the massages.
meanings.sent5: The massages melted away the stress like ice cream on a hot day.
